values:
so i think i've made up my mind about what i'm gonna do next quarter. i'm not gonna be here. i'm going to go to seattle with zach, if he decides to go.

i can't stay in pittsburgh. not when you can get crack up the street and heroin outside your door. i can't do it. the other night, zach's roommate and all his friends were rollin' face in zach's room. it was funny to watch and remember, but then i noticed that alot of the kids in the room were 1st quarter aip kids. and i was like "wow...that was totally me 2 quarters ago. stupid and all fuckedup." 

yeah, i've moved from ecstacy to heroin and now to nothing. but still, it sucks to be around everyone all fuck'd up. me and zach either chill in the building in his room or john's room or we leave and go to buck's or somewhere else. there's no point in chillin outside when i got people coming up to me, asking me if i wanna split a bag or roll or trip or something. i'm happy with my weed thanks...and copius amounts. but i can't handle all the rest of the stuff, no matter how much i like it. 

me and zach sat down and talked for a long time, last saturday when i got back from ohio. i decided to get a bag and i felt so bad about hiding it from zach that i broke down and told him. he wasn't mad,  just scared for me and i promised i wouldn't do it again. its been a week now, and to some, thats not alot of time, but to me, its good progress, damnit. and zach's proud of me too, i know it. because he's all i've really got in pittsburgh, and if i fuck that up, then what else is there.

hopefully, this time next month, year - whatever - i wont be here. in fact, i refuse to be here. because i'll die if i am.

summer break hasn't really been relaxing. its been horribly stressful and full of tears and no zach at all because he is in seattle.

i realized that this quarter, i fucked up way more than i ever have on a completely differently level than i ever thought that i would see. it'll all be over after this week, sadly, but that's how it has to be. my aunt wasn't joking when she said "when you go back to pittsburgh you'll have a different attitude."

i will. and i will be awesome this quarter. not the people around me, not my situation - me. and it'll be so rewarding.

zach's in seattle with clay and his other friends, looking at resturants to work at and places to live. he said he found a place and they need another roommate *wink wink nudge nudge*. yeah i most definitely would leave pittsburgh and go to the Seattle Film Institute. because pittsburgh is a hellish place with good times thrown in for good measure.

"this city's a vampire she eats her kids - lets' hide the bodies under the brdige" and "when angels fall, they fall in pittsburgh" seem to be the right quotes. ha. 

i will say this much - it hurts to be this much in love. i miss zach's eyes. i miss his hands. i miss his voice, his real voice, not the distorted sound that comes through the phone when he's in seattle, in a different time zone.  i love it when he whispers "i love you" in my ear...i can't wait to see him again.

he said he got me some more oil! but not patchouli this time - amber i think. if i get the money together for his birthday, he'll get his bong and it'll be sweet. 

he told all his friends i resemble rosario dawson *thanks to john and everyone else* and now he says he can't watch Sin City without getting all sad. aw... :)

ok. its late, i havent taken a shower and i need to go smoke a blunt with my main man marc - yeah...

its been an interesting week.

i had quite the re-awakening with my mom which was awesome because we're so much closer because of it. i think thats really cool that i can talk to my mommy like that. i hope it stays that way. 

thursday night was fucked up - things happened, not to me but to others, that shouldnt have happened and those responsible will pay for their actions. because that's a fucked up thing to do. for sure. luckily, all present parties involved seem ok and thats what counts.

my weekend was incredibly slow - it was so bipolar is was ridiculous. i didnt really want to talk to any one and any attempts at making me feel better simply made it worse. but i'm better now, shits getting straightened out and i'm happier. i'm sure i wont find true happiness, not at 19 and in pittsburgh, but im getting there and it feels awesome.

it was nice to have zach come back from ohio. he said he missed the smell of patchouli and he hated sleeping alone. that's pretty cool i'd say.

yesterday, me, john and zach went to an all you can eat KFC buffet, granted i dont eat meat, it was funny anyway - john and zach stuffed themselves w/ chicken and mashed potatoes and gravy for a good amount of time - then we went to barnes and nobles and it was awesome because it'd been too long since i'd been surrounded by books like that. i love the smell of bookstores.

hopefully the weather will get better soon so i can sit outside and read w/ a blunt - cuz the weathers been fucked and i've been inside all the time, usually in my room alone or in zach's room, both of which get old fast. ha. 

bring on the nice weather, june. bring it on.

i love you's were exchanged and it was awesome.

i'm happy - minus the fight i had with my mom and this whole revealing who i am scenario. it sucks, but its gotta be done. 

...life.

i'm happy for the most part - i start'd actually going to class and doing my homework for a change - AWESOME.

jon's party is tonight - it should be aight. if not, then its off to see star wars...i guess.

i think tonight i'm goin' to kayla's to get some pancakes and eggs - and it'll be awesome.

cinco de  mayo was fun: me and sam ate some mushrooms and tripped in the sun for the better part of the day. it was a good time for sure - we got attacked by pigeons and sam made a masterpiece w/a rock: goodtimes.

some people are going home for the weekend but im staying in town. im sure the weekend will have some tricks up it's sleeve. saturday night, i may decide to go to kayla's and party - apparently there are going to be mad people tripping. goodtimes.  tonight, zach's taking me to a fish-fry at his friends house - nothing like fish, vodka and white rhino to get the weekend started right, yeah? i suppose - im not really in the drinking mood, and im pretty sure the vodka was bought for me - oops. i'll eat my fair share of fish tho - and smoke that white rhino. :)

its been a good week though. the other day dave came by and me, belinda, james and sam went to his place out in crafton, smoked a blunt and watched Leminy Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events. i sorta missed most of the movie though. my big brother was attacking me with vicious lies about zach and his admiration for midget porn. huh?

everett and dave both hung out w/ zach and me and mitch and sam yesterday though : everett and zach in the same room - how's that for slightly uncomfortable but really funny at the same time.  

western civilization is sucking my ass at the moment. and im thinking about dippin' out early - Meena won't notice, the twit.

good gravy.

another awesome weekend, minus my being sick with a bad chest cold.

friday nite, zach took me to the walnut grill in shadyside and it was so good...and expensive. i felt special. :)

saturday night i was gonna stay in but we all decided to go to the party on the southside. we get there and zach calls
zach: are you there?
me: yeah. where are you?
zach: at allegheny...tripping my face off.
me: fuck you! that's so unfair!

lucky for me, the acid got there after zach did and i got a hit and he took another. and we geeked out the rest of the night - it was fucking awesome. i tripped from 11:30 pm till at least 5pm the next day.  we watched natural born killers and i damn near lost it in my head. it was amazing. rashad was fucked up beyond recognition and it was hilarious.  buddah's tripping tonite and zach said he might again. i doubt i will - i'm still recouperating from saturdaynite/sundaymorning!

but anyway, the weekend was awesome but now im stuck w/ this god-awful cold and i just wanna go home and go to sleep....

ah well...the day's almost over and i can go home, and do just that.

hell yes. im so happy right now. this weekend has been killer....

friday nite was the Top Flite party for Al and D. we got SO DRUNK. all of us: me, belinda, kelly, ben, cassie, mone - it was awesome. i had mad grey goose, beer then went home and got some 151 from our neighbors. the next day, i finished off the 151 and was drunk all day - zach and sam tripped but i was drunk, but zach bought me and him a roll and we flipped the fuck out all nite. it was awesome. so much fun with my zach :)

HELL YA! cuz he's mine now! he asked me to be his girlfriend last nite before we went to sleep..and i happily accepted. :) he's so adorable.

its a nice day, a little windy but nice. tomorrow, zach's going shopping and taking kate and belinda and me with him to spend his $1500. awesome. and this weekend, me and sam are going home with belinda. goodtimes in napoleon are sure to come.

awesome.

this weekends been pretty damn good. for sure. 

friday nite, dave came by and visited with his cousin and a friend of his and me and belinda and sam and zach all went to the fountain to smoke a few bowls. i was RETARDED. then me, sam, belinda and zach sat in belinda's car and chiefed some more. awesome. 

then me and zach almost got peed on, on the way back to his building. then i went to his room, smoked another bowl, went downstairs grabbed some beers (i was retarded, zach was drunk as fuck) and came back up to listen to a whole lot of interpol.

zach's so cute <3  that was an AWESOME nite.... AWESOME. :) 

we were supposed to get some liquid acid from one of zach's friends but he didnt come through, so me belinda and sam decided to roll instead : yellow smileys. smacky as hell but great as fuck. the three of us has the most awesome time walking around PNC park during the game, catching a few fireworks and SAVING A MANS LIFE!

belinda saw someone fall into the water and we were JUST starting to roll. we walk up and we're all like "whoa!" theres a guy holding onto the sides of the warf, in the water. he was riding his bike and fell in. i grabbed his arm and so did another lady and i kept asking him if he was ok. i had the eye wiggles like a MOTHER FUCKER but i was cool. eventually, belinda got a security guard or something and we helped pull him out. it was insane.

but it was an awesome nite. and the guy at sunoco was like "wow i wanna go to the party YOU GUYS just came from" we just stood there and smiled. wow. and the next day, everett buzzes our room and invites me and belinda to smoke a blunt. awesome.

we called josh morrow and he was tripping balls: apparently elise has acid. but so does dave! and maybe zach's still getting his liquid - PITTSBURGH'S A PSYCHEDELIC MESS MAN! ... and its awesome. :)

aight, its hot as fuck today and we walked to school, even tho we didnt have class. but its alright.  we're gonna sit in the grass again and get another tan. awesome.

word of the quarter: awesome.

yesterday was an awesome day:

me and belinda were supposed to have a work day, where we went grocery shopping, did our homework and went to a job fair. we decided not to go to the job fair and laid in the grass all day, doing homework/chillin out. jesse came by and we all played frisbee for a while. it was awesome. then i went in, took a shower, and me and belinda went to the grocery store were we got THREE CHEESE TORTELLINI! awesome.

i never finished my homework, on time anyway. but i got it finished. i didnt do my digital image manipulation homeowkr though because my teacher goes too fast for me and i dont know photoshop that well and its too late to drop the class ( THAT blows - ah well )

i had a good day yesterday - and woke up *glowing* (belinda...haha...wow, thats ridiculous- next time, you can just STAY and make your grilled cheese sandwich...lol). 

goodshit.

oh! and on saturday, i got to go home and take james and sam with me to meet two of my *big brothers* and i got WICKED TRASHED! i threw up and laid on the bathroom floor forEVER and it was GREAT!

haha. goodshit.

fuck yeah this quarter has started out pretty damn awesome, if i do say so myself.

our room is kickass and comfy and my school aint that bad - aside from the three 8ams i have this quarter (!). but thats ok, i think its something telling me not to fuck around too much this quarter because on 3 out of the 5 days of the week, i gotta get up at 6:15. and my classes are alright, except for Western Civilization, which sounds horrible. my Film Survey class = awesome. Maietta teaches it, and i've had him once for scriptwriting and have him for Video 2 this quarter - he's a great teacher.

the weather at the beginning of this week was AWESOME. it made it really summer for awhile and i'm loving every minute of it. its finally sunny.

this weekend, belinda and i might be going home to go to my friends house for his birthday ... or something. all i know is that theres supposed to be mad amounts of alcohol and, when me and belinda get there, mad amounts of weed-smokage.  that'd be great.

speaking of mad weed smokage, i've been smoking ALOT this week - and its great. its made my week so much better. and on top of that, i got offered an oxy and didnt take it. i wanted it so bad though - but i didnt. and why - because this quarter is going to be awesome. ive coined "awesome" as the word of the quarter. but anyway, i've been smokin' mad weed. good weed. and i bought that cookie off of elise - which is was great enough to to STILL talk about. :)

things are alright right now. and thats great. and focusing on the now is whats up. fan-fuckin-tastic.

i'm home and it feels so good its ridiculous.

sunday after easter dinner, i went out w/ marc and we smoked a fat blunt together: i missed him so much and we had such a good time.
last night, i went out w/ my big brothers cir, alex and phelps. we went to the aroma like we always used to, sat and smoked mad cigarettes and drank mad coffee and talked and laughed and they're trying to convince me to come back to akron because they miss their little sister. i love those guys with all my heart.

being at home makes me feel like a little kid again; all secure and shit. driving around listening to music and smiling. i feel stupid and happy. 

we've all decided to make this next quarter the shit. no ifs, ands, or buts about it. i'm not letting anything negative get in my way if i can help it. i refuse to do it. because it did nothing but fuck me over the last time around and i'm not going through bullshit again. i'm gonna focus on whats important and look out for me. 

hell ya. 

i'm off to smoke a fat one w/ marc.

peace.

party last nite was awesome. got wasted like i wanted to. lost at beer pong which was great cuz it got me fucked up faster. hellyah. smoked mad weed with ppl i didnt know half the time - tha's wha's up. 

my all-day headache sucked and i opted to leave early before it went into a full-scale migraine. but i had a  damn good nite anyway. fuck yeah.

i gotta pack and shit to move outta allegheto tho, im gonna miss it, i see that now. i wont be able to lay around on the couch w/ kelly all damn day anymore, or sit with pat and act stupid. i wont be able to run to katie's room and act dumb with her on whatever psychedelic we choose. im gonna miss ppl for sure. it makes me sad to think about it.

ah well. new beginnings. i guess.

i still really wanna go home tho. still feelin' mighty alone. yeah. i just miss my home and my family.

peace.

its sunny today.  and thats enough to start me into a good mood. lets hope it stays that way. at least for a minute. 

my weekend was alright: saturday i sat around lazily with tory james and ben and watched as people came and went to and from market square wasted off their asses. then we went to cvs when on the way back we saw nate, grant, mike and brandon. grant was kind enough to let me chug some of his whiskey which gave me a NIIICE buzz for a while. then dave called and took me tory james and ben to his place to drink the 2 cases of PBR he'd bought. then we went to zachs place, smoked weed-age and then i left w/ leah sam and katie for TACO BELL! it was the BEST meatless nachos bellgrande and apple caramel empanada i'd EVER FUCKING HAD. i was so hungry/stoned/tipsy. goodtimes.

sunday was lazy, except for the walking to jesse's and vinny's w/ Dre Dubz to help him w/ his "cat man" skit. i did come home to shrimp and rice, a tuna fish sandwich, cookies, and perogies and french fries - talk about binge eating.

so hopefully today will be ok, even though i have another class at 6 oclock.

and on wed. we get to go look at 2 more houses on mt.washington - they're promising, after i talked to chealsea. 

so lets hope my semi-good vibe continues throughout whenever.

peace.

my dream:

i dont remember what i saw, but i know i could hear footsteps. and the footsteps where scaring me. and they wouldn't go away and it was dark. i was screaming so loud but all i could see what dark and hear sounds. people outside of doors and people walking. it was so disorienting. and when i tried to scream again, i screamed "wake up! get out of here! get out!"

and i opened my eyes. and cried.

i want to go home right now. i dont like being in allegheny. i try to get out whenever i can. 

i talked to someone on the smoke deck when i got to school today about how fucked up pittsburgh and everything in it is. i talked about leaving, not school completely, just starting somewhere else.

if i can get all my financial shit taken care of, see if scholarships and loans roll over to another Art Institute, i might try to make next quarter my last quarter. i want to get into that house or where ever life decides to put me, live there and get my mind out of allegheny then go. the thought of being here for 2 more years scares the hell out of me. AIP classes arent like they should be and im tired of paying X amount of money to learn shit. that is my main concern. 

i came to AIP with this big dream. and everyday, they're shot to hell. i wont get anywhere if i stay here. im pretty confident about that. 

i just have to show my parents that this isnt the place for me. and if i go somewhere else and have to pay my own way through college, then so be it. i'll do what it takes to be happy. 

i cant help but feel like everyones lying to my face about everything.

i realized the other nite while i cried in the stairwell that there really is nothing in pittsburgh for me. being here makes me sick to my stomach and i shouldnt feel this way. no one should.

i'm looking to the Art Institute of Philadelphia. i dont know if philly is the place for me, but i know the place for me is not pittsburgh. i cant handle being this alone and upset all the time. i feel better when i sleep. its so much better when i just sleep.

i'm hoping summer will change things. i'm sure it will. but i have to get out of pittsburgh and fast. thats all i know.

peace.

things that come to me when my eyes are closed always make a bigger impression on me than things i see with my eyes open. for sure. thats just how i am. if i'm asleep, or im thinking and my eyes are closed, its blocking off all outside influences and coming from a more important place, whatever it is i'm thinking about.

so yeah, the things that've popped into my head when i've been asleep or thinking in whatever state i happen to be in are just odd to say the least. odd but true...

*i hope she decides to stop doing this soon because its making me sick because something's wrong.
*i hope he's happy with his revelation, i hope he knows what that could mean later on in life.
*i hope i'm happy with my own acceptance of me, because though i've been this way for a long time, my whole life, its hard to say it out loud. for sure.
*i hope he doesn't go too far. 
*i hope seeing isnt believing.  

until these things materialize (or dont), im going with the flow. i cant stop fate, i cant change it, i can only make it mine. 

that doesnt stop me from getting aggravated with situations and things and people. 

i think everyone should look at themselves long and hard, including myself. i think everyone's confused right now, even if they've come to a definite about something - its all the more reason step back and examine. 

i keep quiet about these things. its not my place to say out loud what im thinking sometimes.

i'll say one thing for certain - silence doesnt mean you dont understand. i dont think everyone understands that.

so im in scriptwriting right now. but i left after he said "go work on your scripts and show me later how you've done". he'll be lucky if i come back to sign out at all. fuck that.

today's shitty. i woke up to Kaneima's fucking alarm going off and she wasnt even there. then i got ready really fast and decided to go back to sleep for another 45 minutes. woke shane's ass up and signed him out and then started the chilly walk to school. i feel sorta sick - but not in the flu/strep throat/cold sorta way. my minds all random and i cant think straight. i feel incredibly spacey and dont know quite what to do with myself.  and tracee loses her mind. again.

i'm sick and tired of all of this stupid bullshit that shouldnt be an issue in my life but is. sometimes, i wish i was back at home, with my parents and my brother. just hanging out. relaxing. not giving a damn about anything. i've been trying to give off a happy vibe lately but it aint happening. i want a downer and im happy i dont have money to get any. this BLOWS MY ASSHOLE!

on a *happier??*  note, i left ben's valentine's day gift on his bed and i suppose he got it. he called and i missed it and i called him back and he didnt pick up. whatever. i'll stop by sometime and see whats up. i like him alot - i think a nicer sorta guy is exactly what i need right now. and someone not necessarily in our tight knit family. to say i want to escape is harsh, but it'd be nice to have someone to rest my head. preferably a shoulder to rest my head on.

ok so i guess im gonna go actually work on my scriptwriting homework. i really wish i had a dime that i could take home, smoke w/ the trinity and then chill the fuck out. eat some food. listen to some music and get my mind off shit.

and on top of that, its not warm anymore. fuck.

but i have to say, i love my parents. i had a good time with them on saturday. they're pretty great.

this weeks been interesting to say the least.

i had a great day on saturday, walking around southside and then up to mt.washington to roll with rachel. that was a blast for sure.

then sunday was a lazy ass day - monday came and i had midterms (im pretty sure i failed the editing theory one - but the ethics one was alright)

i havent gone to school since monday because - well, i just dont feel like it. i skipped scriptwriting this morning since we didnt have a midterm.

im quite confused about the whole shane issue because i dont really like him. sure i cuddled with him and made out w/ him *two things im not entirely proud of* but i just did it because there was no one else to do those two things with. "desperate" is my middle name. but im not THAT desperate - desperate enough to say i have a crush on him *something i thought and then dismissed REAL fast*. fuck that.

and everyones got there someone. except me.                          

life sucks right now and i want to go home.

i've had a pretty good week so far.

yeah. 

that is all.

from 1:20 till 2:00am, i rolled my face off. then from 2:00 all the way until 10:00am i felt so perfectly fine its unbelievable. and for some reason, from around 3:00 till i went to sleep at 10 (and even after i woke up) i was tripping balls in my room all by myself. fucking wow. double stacked sunflowers are the way to do it right. jesus christ...

so its january 17 - 1 day till my 19th birthday. i'll be happy to be 19 and not 18 anymore. whatever that means. it feels more better somehow. so this week's been interesting, on the inside and on the outside. i've been thinking really hard about who i am, what i want to be, where i want to go from here. sure i'm young, but i know i'd find a certain sense of security if i had some idea what the fuck to do. but maybe i'm not supposed to know, im finding. the acid dropping we all did the other night helped fuel that entire fire. i was thinking about shit before and getting really depressed about it: about my relationships with my friends, my parents, the world around me. i found out that im a different person, since when i came here to AIP. and i think for the better. i've had a lot of firsts and i've also continued doing things that i know very well and make me comfortable ( ie. smoking with my best friends - hellzyah :) ). as a person i think i've grown. hell i dont even feel comfortable in my own clothes anymore, well not all of them anyway. that's weird. i've met so many great people and they've affected me, undoubtly. i know that because of the people i've met and the experiences i've had thus far, i am a better and changed person than the indiefuck that i came here as. this quarter hasnt' started out too well, seeing as how i decided to have this "life altering" thought process the same week as the first week of school. ive missed 2 classes already. that is not good. this quarter i have to make myself work harder. that includes outside of school - i applied at Outback Steakhouse and they called me for an interview (kids, keep your fingers crossed at 2:30 this wednesday). that's a good thing. i havent been doing as many drugs - also a good thing, depending on how you look at it :). . . no ones been on adderall for days straight, rolling out of their minds or doing oxys till it hurts. though acid has been a drug of choice lately - but acid comes few and far between, so i say take advantage if that's your thing (my rachel - hehe). hopefully, rachel belinda and myself (and dani, if she decides to stay in pittsburgh) will find a reasonably priced house not too far from school and shit and we'll be happy. because that's all i really want. happiness. i was thinking harder about what i want to do when i get out - and Twin Oaks sounds like a good place to be. it still needs more time to marinate in my mind but maybe. i'm also considering transfering. when, i dont know. where, maybe seattle, san diego - im not sure yet about that either. i suppose we'll cross that bridge when we get to it. i've been on a weird sleep pattern, trying to fend off the depression and trying to have a good time. so far i think im getting better. im also infatuated with adam, who's really a hardcore dick and probably a slut - but right now, that'll do. i'm sure this will be over before you can say "valentines day". ah. who knows wtf is going on. i hate feeling this lonely all the time. it sucks! ha. shit happens. and what do you do - take it in stride. it helps you grow. addition: Horoscope for Monday January 17, 2005 - "Even the biggest waves won't drag you under if you know how to swim."

i've gone inside myself for a while. i'll be back later. i guess. i've gotta get a job. maybe Sonoma Grille. yeah... some people bring back bad memories. because in THAT department, its hard to make new ones, apparently. and my love horoscope for today: "Your natural caution kicks in when you're presented with something unusual in the realm of romance. Your wariness is warranted; make sure you're getting what you want before you sign up." im being hellah wary. because im tired of jumping into shit too fast and sadly crawling out of it.

its the fucking new year and this one better be the shit. 2004 had its high points, but it also had its low points. those of us that knew what to do with it, we did it right :)

new years eve kicked my ass in the best way possible. me, rachel, dave, my friend erin, belinda, her two friends steudi and reid, brandon cleary and our collective souls went to rusted root.

oh my god. it was so great to dance like a hippie again (i hadnt done it in TOO FUCKIN LONG) and connect with the old man in front of us who was OBVIOUSLY fucked up - i soluted him. Tom's kicked ass afterwards and  chillin with rachel and steudi till we fell asleep - that was a damn fine time.

nick wasnt here though :( which was sad. but i talked to him on the phone RIGHT before 2005 came and i'm *smitten* hehehe...

im now at belinda's house in little Napoleon Ohio...and can i just say - NAPOLEON WEED KICKS MY ASS. i dropped $50 on some, in my opinion, bomb ass pot. jesus christ...maybe it was just me.

we didnt get to trip like we wanted to. lewis didnt get in contact with the guy - oh well. i was really looking forward to it to. but i'd really want rachel <3 to be there too...so maybe when we're all around, it'll happen. hellya. I MISS U RACHEL and i only saw you 2 days ago!

rachel mentioned Bonnaroo - i really wanna go. June 10-12 it said - hellya.

alright...im gonna peace out. i think we're going to the thrift store...or something...im sure i'll be imbibing some delish Napoleon Trees. im toking for you rachel - and dave!!

"i want a little steudi on a strawberry"
our room got raided. and it blows. its quite an annoyance.

going home later on tonite and im happy about that. its been a rough couple of weeks around here lately. while i'll miss some of the people here while i'm gone, im gonna be damn happy to be home. 

im sort of at a loss for words right now. its 5.18 in the a.m. and im still up.  walking w/ rachel and belinda baked to the amtrak station, having some random guy ask us "do you know anywhere where i can score some crack", walking back baked then hanging around till 4 for everett, shane and some random guy brandon.

damnit. now i cant get to sleep.

later today, i'll visit kelly and say goodbye, visit ben and say goodbye, visit jeremy and say goodbye, visit ted and say goodbye. ah. saying goodbye to only say hello in a few more days - with homework over break no less. and NOT calling shane or accepting his calls - crazy ass crackhead. i think NOT. [shivers with pain in rememberance].

motherfuckers. AIP sucks cock.

you know when you were younger and you'd have a bad day and you thought your world was going to end, that nothing could ever be as bad as whatever it was that was happening to you then? funny how i wish those little problems were priority.

i wish it was little stupid petty insignificant things that i was worried about.  but for some reason, someone's trying to test me. trying to make me a stronger person through my surroundings. 

whatever it is, is kicking my ass hardcore. to the point of emotional breakdown. i need to go home for a little while and rethink where i am in life. in my short 18 years. thanksgiving break will be a welcomed break from pittsburgh, the people here and the its situations. i love the people here, and loving means you care and caring means your hurt. at least i've got that much down.

i hate to say "i want friday to come so i can be happy again". but its true. i do. maybe friday will come and i will change my mind. something tells me i wont. but it'd be nice to think that i did.

i miss my family. and akron. i want someone to care about me and make me feel better.

please.

so i got a temporary position at Urban Outfitters. they called me saturday nite and said they wanted me to come in on a monday and wednesday from 8am to 1pm. me - excited? of course. but not about the hour long walk it takes to get there. and i didnt feel like taking the bus (mainly because i have no money in the first place). the day was tedious - i sorted SO MANY underwear for the longest time, then folded sweaters forever and sorted out blazers, jeans and tank tops. madness. one word. euphoria. those of you know who know what im talking about . . . this friday again . . . holla. i gotta remember something my friend told me just the other day: "self-control goes a long way." and about that cuddle buddy ...

saturday night was a really good time. angry at time, but good nonetheless.

-we (rachel, kelly, danni, tory, and ben) decided not to go to the party on california ave. because we heard it was lame. apparently, it really was.
-we decided to go to a party dillon invited us to instead on the southside. after we drank mad vodka and strawberry daquiries and inbibed the hash.
-the walk to southside included us running into the people coming out of the moe. show. a lady was selling pieces on the corner. so rachel bought a chillum. hell yeah. some guy was selling chocolate shrooms. we passed.
-tory and ben bought 40z at the gyro place and got all sorts of fucked up on the way to southside. tory doesnt remember what happened after crossing the 10th street bridge.
-party was alright. i got my beer for free (hellz yeah bitches) and we hung around for about an hour. tory got drawn all over and was severely fuckedup.
-we walked to tom's diner, helping tory all the way. tory made an ass of himself in tom's by being beligerent and out of sorts. it was hella funny though.
-the walk home included ben and tory wrestling on the lawn of the county jail, shattering a glass door, finding an old bike to ride home and then throwing it over the bridge into the river, and tory causing destruction in various places.
-we get home. andy calls for me and rachel from his balcony. he comes over and he and rachel roll on e for the rest of the night. i never go to sleep. neither do they. im the dj for the night/morning.
-im still up and but tired and rachel and andy are OUT.
-i just got a call from jesse for an invite to come over. so maybe, if those two wake up (and rachel cleans his apartment, as promised) maybe rachel and i will bounce across the city and chill for the nite over there. it was hella fun last time - sure to be a blast again.

alright. that was a recap if i ever saw one. damn fine one. its been a good weekend thus far. too bad its sunday and i cant get box wine. DAMN.

boys suck ass. "let's go to tom's diner. i'll buy you coffee." and firm slap on the behind, i'm sure. fucking mutt. wtf: ppl rolling E and sniffing Vicks, while listening to Linkin Park really loud with the lights out and the blacklight on, sucking on pacifiers and fuckin tweakin out? too much for my then heavy head to consume. so we had to peace out of that situation. happy birthday kelly.

um - how does one get themselves into situations like mine, because honestly - ha - im at a loss for words. this is absolute insanity if i've seen it. debauchery at its finest. bruises and bite-marks. wow.

cuddle buddy found? ha....cuddle is the wrong damn word.

mmhmm. the past 2 weeks have gone by in a rather smokey haze...uh...and i dont like it. and im losing my mind. but this happens every so often. it'll pass. got played (ok maybe not "got played", more like, "went along with a bad idea") by a slut who tried to fuck both me AND my roommate - luckily i got to share the joy with crazy erin. she understood all too well. cuz she's the shit. never again will i let someone borrow my "hot sauce". yeah you heard me right bitches. my HOT SAUCE. i skipped lighting class and missed a shitload of info and a project and wow - i dont really care. i find a certain joy in sitting outside the building reading Kurt Vonnegut at 1 in the morning. especially when there is a sweet-ass eclipse. cuddle buddy still wanted . . . even if he is a slut :)

its been a cold and boring week. i've done nothing but sit around and go to class. i did get called back for a second interview thing at Urban Outfitters, but alas, i did not get the job. either they're late on calling me, like they were the first time, or they dont want me. but that's ok. i'll just find another job elsewhere i guess. that does suck though. pretty damn bad. i called my mom and told her everything that's been going on lately. she laughed heartily at my misfortunes and we joked around. i miss my mom sometimes. anyone know of any cheap(er) apartments here in pittsburgh - sorta nice, but not sickeningly expensive. it'd be the shit to live on the south side once my allegheny center lease is up. cuddle buddy wanted

wow. this has not been a good week at all : after talking to erin on the phone i found out some disturbing news...and then i find all this shit that leads me to further believe what she told me.

"im on the phone with you right now . . .ur cute" - taken from a xanga comment. wtf? like that's necessary. on top of everything else, this has most definitely made me take a turn for the worst, concerning my mental stability. 

i just want love. that's all. is that so damn bad to ask for? i just want to shrivel up in bed and sleep.

look who's posing with their kitty. . .

(pose taken from a porno mag - way to be john g)

ive been home in akron ohio now for about 5 days. and ive already started working again. too bad i've got 2 weeks to make some money before i come back and have to work and go to school. lifes a bitch.

when it gets boring here, it gets boring - especially when you have no car and everyone lives a motherfucking 40 minutes away. but it doesnt matter, because they're in class and you have to wait until they get out - oh wait, you're at work when they get out. im still enjoying being back.

hanging around with cir and phelps, alex and josh at aroma coffee. then at chopstix. watching even MORE family guy over cir's. visiting Our Father's House ((it'd been too long)) and seeing everyone. i even got HUGS! and austin's lil' sis maddie is making me cookies. how adorable.

then my dad buys absolut and cranberry juice. dad you're the shit.

we need groceries. i think when i go home in a week or two, i'm gonna get alot from sam's club or bj's. because cheap food in bulk = the shit.

labor day weekend was leisurely, friday nite and sunday nite being highlighted indefinitely. more like that to come when i return from home i'm sure.

i think when i go home - the hair is getting cut. drastically. again. because, hell, it's time for a damn change. why not....

its raining - someone would say "its such a scenester sort of day..."

oh damn.

for some reason, ive been freakishly depressed for the passed couple of days. this used to happen at home all the time. so figured, it'd sorta i dunno - stop, once i came to school because i'd be in a new place. wrong. but it wasnt so bad. cuz i couldnt ever really be "alone" because there's always people around. so i didnt have time to wallow in it. that didnt stop me from crying at the most random times though. like on the walk to school. or while i was working on my powerpoint. or right before i fell asleep. 

weird.

and today i had the worst piercing headache behind my eye and felt like i was gonna pass out crossing the bridge, it took everything inside of me to get over it and into the building. im better now tho - i took 3 pills of headache helper and had some macaroni and cheese.

and this powerpoint project shit is pissing me the hell off. i dont even give a fuck if i get an F. matus can kiss my ass. so can gotlieb.

oh geez. so beautiful on so many different levels.

i know i cried...and i was in a such a good mood afterwards. (((this might be the best movie i've ever seen)))

this weeks been slow for some reason. so slow. but its friday now - and i have 1 class left - and i plan on sleeping in it, so no worries. then i'll go home and take yet ANOTHER nap. and maybe eat something - oh wait, we've got NOTHING.

my parents are coming to visit tomorrow. maybe they'll take me grocery shopping and out to eat - i've never been so excited to see my parents. im so hungry and broke!!!

i offically hate color theory and design after that wretched man made us paint that stupid ass color wheel for our mid-term. that mans hair...GOOD GOD.

i should stop smoking. i cough too much...and i can feel it in my lungs. and it takes too much money.

i guess its vodka friday at jesus'.... hmm.... what savage tales of debauchery will unfold i wonder?? none involving me, i hope. someone hold my hand.

i need a new pair of jeans - mine have a rip in them...and i just dont feel like patching them. besides, i wear these jeans almost everyday and i've had them for 3 years - i'd say they've run their gamet.

i need a job like WHOA. nuf said on the subject.

dented hearts heal fast. at least....they act like they do...and they dont show any signs of relapsing...

so i got a phone call from austin last night. and he asked me how i was doing, and i said fine. and he said how i thought things were going with "us" and i said fine, that i missed him and that i was sorry i hadn't called him in a few days. and i was being 100% honest about all of that. and then he said he felt really distant. that he felt like i didn't care anymore. and that he'd been flirting with other girls. and that he didn't love me anymore - but he cared about me. and that he thought it would be best if we took a break. but someone on indiefucks happily commented to my lamenting post by saying "yeah - break is short for breakup". so i guess i'm single now. and there was a time not at all too long ago when i thought that this is what i wanted - to be single. but now that i dont have him, i realize that i want him back. i never stopped loving him. ever. i just got caught up in shit. i guess i got what i deserved. i dont mind him flirting or even whatevering with whomever. i'm no hypocrite. but i really wish he hadn't said he didnt love me anymore....because caring about me isn't enough. i need my friends now: my ohio friends. and my pittsburgh friends.

we went to the gay bar tuesday nite for the drag show. it was an especially good time when one of them pulled out a dildo as a prop for her number. hot shit, i love drag queens. i straightened john's hair for the occasion. he looked so scene. ha. crazy rachel took pics. rachel's got more pics on her LJ ... john with good hair. next monday - xiu xiu. my friend erin is coming into town to see it with us. exciting. i want a good weekend. jesus is coming back home friday...maybe that'll help.

some biatch said i hadn't updated in a while, so i figured i'd do her a favor...even tho she left me all alone with the Devil in our room saturday nite - no worries. i slept with john in his drunken stuper. no worries, i didnt molest him - JUST TICKLED HIM OUT OF HIS MIND.

there was no Jager at jesus' but there was raspberry vodka, of which i had 4 shots, and a nice mug of Jack and iced tea. so i was nicely fucked up for little while. 

sadly, jesus' molested both john and myself. i feel dirty. but he got what was coming to him - he threw up on the carpet and woke up this morning with no pants on - just his red striped bikini style underwear. damn...yes - something needs to be brought into question.

um....we've got practically no food in the house - and its an effing mess. i'm gonna do some major kitchen cleaning today - and hopefully make a run to the grocery store with the money mi padre put in my checking account. because honestly - we're starving here.

alrighty. goodbye for now.

whoadang. 

madness. sheer madness is what ensues in room 803 at 7 allegheny. 

its been good so far. (except for my sitting in the library because i have a three hour gap between fundamentals of media and freshman studies) shout me a hollar y'alls. im in pittsburgh now. 

330-289-6176.

i went and got my AiP schdule on saturday. not bad, at least to me.

monday: computer literacy 1-5:20
tuesday: drawing 8-12:20, english 1-3:09
wednesday: nothing
thursday: color theory 8-12:20, english 1-3:09
friday: fundamentals of media 8-12:20, freshman studies 3:10-5:20

i think the guy at the desk said this was only tentative. i hope not, cause i think i like it.

i was supposed to get my happy lil' ID card - but apparently the bastards in the library had broken the digital camera, as my friend put it. the question "its an art school - you'd think they'd have more than one digital camera, wouldn't ya?" came up as well...so i guess i'll come back sometime soon to see if its fixed.

and apparently, there's supposed to be a "Barbecure Night" during orientation for us newbies.

too bad i'm a vegetarian. so i guess i'll have to pass - poo. who am i kidding - i need to get out of ohio - and i'll be glad to be a part of a meat-fest if thats what it takes :)

being out of school is a wonderful feeling. absolutely wonderful.

so i figure this job i may be getting might bring in some hefty pay-checks. excited? slightly.

even more excited to know i'll be out of this town in less than 2 months ((someones gonna have to hold my hand in pittsburgh for a while tho - no doubt i'll be nervous :) )) 

i think i'm getting a haircut. pixie-ish. and my new tattoo will be visible soon - that is, once i get the money to get it. 

woot.

**"students. in the past, activities included variety shows, beach trips,"

2) Stretch your left arm out as far as you can. What do you touch first?
**the wall/window

3) What is the last thing you watched on TV?
**the realworld/roadrules inferno thing on MTV

4) WITHOUT LOOKING, guess what the time is.
**4:15pm

5) Now look at the clock, what is the actual time?
**5:16pm

6) With the exception of the computer, what can you hear?
**the television and my mother

7) When did you last step outside? What were you doing?
**early this morning at 2am. i was loving austin goodbye

8) Before you came to this website, what did you look at?
**habitat for humanity groups in pennsylvania

9) What are you wearing?
**khaki courderoy pants, white oxford, black and white stripped sweater, white socks

10) Did you dream last night?
**i dont remember. i was really really sleepy...

11) When did you last laugh?
**last night when austin was over. he kept saying "i better go". but he kept getting sidetrackd, apparently...

12) What is on the walls of the room you are in?
**white paint and funky flowered wallpaper.

13) Seen anything weird lately?
**those flying fish on that stupid skittles commercial

14a) What book(s) are you currently reading?
**the return of the native (against my will); thus spoke zarathustra (because i feel like it damnit!)

14b) What is the last book you finished?
**the fuckup

15) What is the last film you saw?
**hedwig and the angry inch (for the millionth time)

16) If you became a multi-millionaire overnight, what would you buy first?
**a college edduction at Columbia College in Chicago to study film

17) Tell me something about you that hardly anyone knows.
**i am insatiable

18) If you could change one thing about the world, regardless of guilt or politics, what would you do?
**um....too important of a question for...5.27 in the afternoon.

19) Do you like to dance?
**of course and really dirty

20) What is the last thing you ate or drank?
**a grilled cheese sandwich, honeybbq chips, and a vernors 

21a) Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her?
**Sophia

21b) Imagine your first child is a boy, what do you call him?
**Estlin or Tanner

i suppose this evening did not go to waste as i had previously foresaw.

i called jamie up and we drove around for bit, stopped off at square records and almost bought big black's "songs about fucking" but decided against it. we ended up at barnes and nobles where we looked through the muchly illustrated "Guide To Lesbian Sex" book because we had nothing else to do. then we headed off to Cafe Momus for a sip of coffee and a cigarette or two or more. all in all, it was a beautiful evening.

austin was s'posed to come in tonight but he woke up this morning feeling ill and almost decided against coming home but (and thank God) he didnt. i dont think i'll get to see him tonight tho - or tomorrow nite. 

sad...i wanted to ravage him so badly.

tomorrow nite is "Only Undies" nite at pirates cove - who's up for a lil' semi-nude fun...c'mon kiddies, you know you want to.
